```{r setup}
library(readxl)
```
## load the trash data 

```{r}
trash_data = read_excel("Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx")
  janitor::clean_names(trash_data) 
  names(trash_data)
  drop_na(trash_data)
  drop_na(trash_data, Dumpster)
```
## Round Number of Sports Balls to Nearest Integer 
```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
```
```{r}
  trash_data %>% 
  mutate_if(sports_balls(is.numeric), round)
```
